extendedInfo.description: Do you ever get stumped while playing Hanging With Friends? Not anymore! You just found the easiest and fastest way to get help while playing your favorite hangman game! Our exclusive transparent overlay appears right on top of your game whenever you need help building or solving words to ensure you always have a big leg-up on your friends. The build mode overlay sits right on top of your rack so that you can easily enter all of your letters and your special board space. Just click "Build" and get the highest scoring words and gain coins faster than ever! Stump all your friends with hard-to-solve words every time!Solve mode is designed to sit directly above the word you're trying to solve. Simply click on the letters you know aren't in the word to X them out. Enter the letters you know are in the word using the intuitive popup keyboard feature. Clicking solve will deliver all of the most probable letters and best guesses to make.-The most intuitive UI of any Hanging With Friends cheat app-Amazingly fast searches-Click on any word to get its definition and never be accused of cheating by using words you don't know!-Easily switch between apps using notificationsAs with all epEK.ware apps, comments and feedback on Hanging With Help For Friends are always appreciated. A link to my email address can be found within the app.Note: This app is in no way associated with Zynga, Inc, makers of the Hanging With Friends word game. This helper app is made by an independent developer.

reviews.title: Hanging
reviews.comment: Good app. Works well on phone. Good overlay and easy to use. Nice one
reviews.author: Glen Bishop

reviews.title: Best app for help
reviews.comment: Tried others, THIS ONE IS THE BEST!!!!  And it just got better.  Now it follows the word selection rules in the game regarding revealing the last vowel. Makes this the easiest to use and now far more accurate!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No longer works!
reviews.comment: Due to an update of the game itself, you can no longer open notifications while in play, so you can\'t overlay anymore.
reviews.author: Mocha Mel

reviews.title: Works well
reviews.comment: I\'ve been very satisfied with this app. Feature request:  missing from this (and the others) is an option to add a blank tile to my rack and factor that into the build word search. I\'d be willing to pay for that feature.
reviews.author: Amanda Marie

reviews.comment: I would give it a 5 star but that free daily app crap really sucks.i have not found a way to turn it off..other then that the helper is awsome
reviews.author: ramiro guzman

reviews.title: Good tool ... 1 wish
reviews.comment: When I use the bonus blank your tool can\'t help
reviews.author: William Silverthorn

reviews.title: Hang in on
reviews.comment: This app blacks my game in both modes. Gets VERY OLD! And tiring! Needs to be fixed.
reviews.author: Sean MacKnight

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work anymore!!!
reviews.comment: Used to work great, now screen turns black and kicks me off. Please fix!!!!
reviews.author: Brittany Haak

reviews.title: Thumbs up!
reviews.comment: Great help!!!!! Love the format.
reviews.author: Grace Moredock

reviews.title: Good job
reviews.comment: Great app. Well thought out.
reviews.author: Monique Clark

reviews.comment: V good. Overlay works well unlike droidbean app
reviews.author: Chris Donovan

reviews.title: Error
reviews.comment: Not help.App very2 bad,son of bicth
reviews.author: Haziq Haikal

reviews.title: excellent
reviews.comment: Very happy very easy to use
reviews.author: Kezza Tydeman

reviews.title: The BEST!!!
reviews.comment: The best hanging with friends helper out there. I tried several and this one beats them all with the ease of switching back to the game without a lag or freezing up.
reviews.author: Deborah Sturgeon

reviews.title: The Game Lets You See The Very Last Vowel!
reviews.comment: You do know that the game gives you the very last vowel for the word, so why when you try to solve your word with the cheat, it gives you possible words with vowels that come after the one they let you see? Hopes this makes sense.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Galaxy Tablet
reviews.comment: We are playing on a Samsung galaxy tablet that does not have the slide - down notification area. When using task button to move between apps, the helper won\'t overlay the game. How can we use the helper with the galaxy tablet?
reviews.author: Penny Harper

reviews.title: Something is Wrong
reviews.comment: When I payed for this app the ads stopped. NOW all of a sudden the ads are back. SOMETHING IS WRONG  Still the best though.
reviews.author: TRINA Humphrey

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: This is the best helper out there!!
reviews.author: Candyce Cooper

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Thanks
reviews.author: Brenda Heembrock

reviews.comment: awesome & convenient help. only criticism I could give is to maybe not have the \'build a word\' side not automatically clear itself when you switch back to the game. there\'s been a few times I needed to refer back to something & had to reenter all the info again.  Thanks for your help!!!
reviews.author: A Google User
